name: C. Mafia
statement:
One day friends gathered together to play "Mafia". During each round of
the game some player must be the supervisor and other people take part
in the game. For each person we know in how many rounds he wants to be a
player, not the supervisor: the -th person wants to play rounds. What is
the minimum number of rounds of the "Mafia" game they need to play to
let each person play at least as many rounds as they want?
editorial:
In the problem you need to find out how many games you need to play in order to make all people happy. It means that each of them played as many games as he wanted.
